Yaiba-0.2.2: Implementation of Buchberger's algorithmsSource codeContentsIndex
Yaiba.SPoly
Description
An object of type SPoly ord is a map from a Sugar to a list of all Polys with that sugar.
Synopsis
newtype SPoly ord = SP [((Int, Int), CritPair ord)]
newtype CritPair ord = CP (Sugar ord, Mon ord)

tTest :: [(((Int, Int), CritPair ord), Bool)] -> SPoly ord
mTest :: Ord (Mon ord) => SPoly ord -> SPoly ord
updateSPolys :: Ord (Mon ord) => SPoly ord -> (Poly ord, Sugar ord) -> Ideal ord -> SPoly ord
delFindSingleLowest :: Ord (Mon ord) => SPoly ord -> Ideal ord -> ((Poly ord, Sugar ord), SPoly ord)
delFindLowest :: Ord (Mon ord) => SPoly ord -> Ideal ord -> ([(Poly ord, Sugar ord)], SPoly ord)
findMinSug :: [(t, CritPair ord)] -> Sugar ord
toSPoly :: Ord (Mon ord) => Ideal ord -> ((Int, Int), CritPair ord) -> (Poly ord, Sugar ord)
Documentation
newtype SPoly ord Source
SPoly is a map of CritPairs keyed to the generators of an ideal.
Constructors
SP [((Int, Int), CritPair ord)]
Instances
NFData (SPoly ord)
newtype CritPair ord Source
CritPair stores a critical pair as a tuple with the sugar and lcm as in Giovini et al. 1991.
Constructors
CP (Sugar ord, Mon ord)
Instances
Eq (CritPair ord)
Ord (Mon ord) => Ord (CritPair ord)CritPairs are sorted first by sugar, then by lcm.
Show (CritPair ord)
NFData (CritPair ord)
empty :: SPoly ordSource
isEmpty :: SPoly ord -> BoolSource
sizeSP :: SPoly ord -> IntSource
bTest :: SPoly ord -> Ideal ord -> Mon ord -> SPoly ordSource
Delete from the existing queue of CritPairs every pair (i,j) such that [;\tau_i;] and [;\tau_j;] strictly divide [;\tau_k;].
constructN :: Ideal ord -> (Poly ord, Sugar ord) -> Int -> [(((Int, Int), CritPair ord), Bool)]Source
tTest :: [(((Int, Int), CritPair ord), Bool)] -> SPoly ordSource
Consider the set of new pairs nps. Discard all pairs (j,k) s.t. [;\tau_j;] and [;\tau_k;] are comprime, along with any other pair (i,k) s.t. [;\tau_{jk}left|\tau_{ik}\right.;].
mTest :: Ord (Mon ord) => SPoly ord -> SPoly ordSource
Discards from a set of new pairs all pairs (j,k) s.t. [;\tau_{ik}left|\tau_{jk}\right.;] with (i,k) before (j,k) when sorted according to sugar (Fussy).
updateSPolys :: Ord (Mon ord) => SPoly ord -> (Poly ord, Sugar ord) -> Ideal ord -> SPoly ordSource
Applies the b-test to the existing queue. Then applies the t-test and m-test to the new pairs with the addition of an [;f_k;]. Finally, merges the results to produce a new queue.
delFindSingleLowest :: Ord (Mon ord) => SPoly ord -> Ideal ord -> ((Poly ord, Sugar ord), SPoly ord)Source
delFindLowest :: Ord (Mon ord) => SPoly ord -> Ideal ord -> ([(Poly ord, Sugar ord)], SPoly ord)Source
findMinSug :: [(t, CritPair ord)] -> Sugar ordSource
toSPoly :: Ord (Mon ord) => Ideal ord -> ((Int, Int), CritPair ord) -> (Poly ord, Sugar ord)Source
